entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
